ygData.subject: Re: General Classes Rambling
ygData.msgSnippet: Very interesting, Shooman, thanks. I just started grouping in earnest once I got backstab, and I ve been in Unrest for the last couple of levels. Nice thing
ygData.messageBody:
Very interesting, Shooman, thanks. I just started
grouping in earnest once I got backstab, and I've been in
Unrest for the last couple of levels. Nice thing there
is that it's small enough that you see the same
people regularly, so you can group with them and learn
their style. Or learn what you don't like about them.
<br><br>There's also a thread on groups on the Everlore Rogue
board. Not nearly so erudite (!) as your post, but fun.
<br><br>Let me know if/when (I hope it's "when") you get back
to Everquest. Would love to meet you in-game some
day.<br><br>Kharlisht of Kaladim<br>15th season
rogue<br>Drinal<br>Specialising in backstabbing, corpse recovery, and
Butcherblock Mountains guide services.
